metadata.title: Learn WN18 Data Set with RotatE as described by Sun et al., 2019;
metadata.comments: Could not find number of epochs; https://github.com/DeepGraphLearning/KnowledgeGraphEmbedding/blob/master/best_config.sh. The evaluation uses the non-deterministic rank, cf. https://github.com/DeepGraphLearning/KnowledgeGraphEmbedding/blob/a0a3cf75e8e324ef113472489a16927c39c997b2/codes/model.py#L406 .
